ModMetaData.name: [sd] advanced powergeneration
ModMetaData.author: sulusdacor
ModMetaData.description:
"advanced powergeneration" Ver.: 1.0-1.0.1
a light in every corner, an extra workbench there, maybe another cooking stove - wondering where your power went?
- a simple try to add some "late game" power supply - no maintenance/refueling, just place it and get the power.
Download links for Dropbox (current or older versions) or Steamworkshop link for current Rimworld version can be found in the ludeon forum thread linked above.
additional languages: - ChineseSimplified by WishingLaws - Russian by Hanabishi - Japanese by Proxyer - spanish by CANALETA - spanish latin by CANALETA - german by sulusdacor
